name: Jube-Jube
description:
Jube-Jube is a game with rich visual effects, where you need to manage a 3D cube. Do jumps of different amplitude and try to stay on the platform. Control your hero with one touch, get extra points for perfect landings. With the addictive game mechanics, time flies by, wherever you are! Earn points and choose cool skins!
Jube-Jube is an endless arcade jump, the goal is to hold on as long as possible and score maximum points. Try it yourself: how far can you go? Download Jube-Jube, set records and defeat rivals around the world!
